farm.selectCropsHelp: Select the crops that you primarily grow on your farm. These will help personalize your experience.

financial.noData: No financial data available yet. Add income and expenses to see monthly reports.
financial.profitableMsg: Your farm is profitable with a {{percent}}% profit margin.
financial.lossMsg: Your farm is currently operating at a loss. Consider reducing expenses or increasing income.

feedback.title: Give us your feedback

auth.signInMessage: Sign in to your account to manage your farm finances
auth.enterEmailReset: Enter your email to reset your password
auth.resetEmailSent: Password reset email sent. Please check your inbox.
auth.createAccount: Create a new account to track your farm finances
auth.passwordRequirements: Password must contain at least 6 characters, including uppercase, lowercase, and numbers

footer.tagline: Empowering farmers to track finances with ease.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.fetchError: Failed to load dashboard data. Please try again.
dashboard.profitableMsg: Your farm is profitable with a {{percent}}% profit margin.
dashboard.lossMsg: Your farm is currently operating at a loss. Consider reducing expenses or increasing sales.
dashboard.highestProfitMonth: Your highest profit month this year was {{month}}.
dashboard.peakIncome: Income typically peaks during harvest seasons. Plan your expenses accordingly.
dashboard.diversifyRecommendation: Consider diversifying your income sources to stabilize cash flow throughout the year.
dashboard.expenseReview: Review your highest expense categories to identify potential areas for cost reduction.
dashboard.emergencyFund: Set aside some profit as an emergency fund for unexpected expenses or market fluctuations.

common.englishInputOnly: Please enter values in English only

expenses.title: Expenses
expenses.loadError: Failed to load expenses. Please try again.
expenses.deleteError: Failed to delete expense. Please try again.
expenses.noExpenses: No expenses recorded yet. Add your first expense to get started!
expenses.noSearchResults: No expenses match your search criteria.
expenses.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this expense: {{category}} - {{amount}}?
expenses.saveError: Failed to save expense. Please try again.
expenses.notePlaceholder: Add a note about this expense...
expenses.categoryHelperText: Choose an expense category or add a custom one. For custom categories, please enter text in English only.
